org.akomantoso.api

Class AnParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.akomantoso.api.AnParser

  • public class AnParser
extends Object
    Encapsulates a parser for Akoma Ntoso documents. You need to indicate the schema version, and it unmarshals the document for that schema and discovers the docType and returns a object handle to it. See Issue 4 : https://github.com/kohsah/akomantoso-lib/issues/4 for the rationale for this.
    Author:
    Ashok Hariharan

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public static AnDocType parse(AnVersion version,
              InputStream iStream)
                       throws SAXException,
                              JAXBException
        Unmarshalls an Akoma ntoso document - and returns an object of the identified type in the document. If the document type cannot be idenitifed, returns null.
        Parameters:
        version - an AnVersion object identifying the version of the schema to be used
        iStream - the Akoma Ntoso xml document as an InputStream
        Returns:
        AnDocType - this can be OpenStructure, HierarchialStructure etc.This returns the object returned by getAct() , getBill() etc. whichever may be the appropriate doc type. Encapsulated with other information related to the object
        Throws:
        JAXBException
        SAXException

      • parse

        public static AnDocType parse(AnVersion version,
              Reader reader)
                       throws SAXException,
                              JAXBException
        Unmarshalls an Akoma ntoso document - and returns an object of the identified type in the document. If the document type cannot be idenitifed, returns null.
        Parameters:
        version - an AnVersion object identifying the version of the schema to be used
        iStream - the Akoma Ntoso xml document as a Reader object (e.g. FileReader)
        Returns:
        AnDocType - this can be OpenStructure, HierarchialStructure etc.This returns the object returned by getAct() , getBill() etc. whichever may be the appropriate doc type. Encapsulated with other information related to the object
        Throws:
        JAXBException
        SAXException

      • parse

        public static AnDocType parse(AnVersion version,
              URI uri)
                       throws SAXException,
                              JAXBException
        Unmarshalls an Akoma ntoso document - and returns an object of the identified type in the document. If the document type cannot be idenitifed, returns null.
        Parameters:
        version - an AnVersion object identifying the version of the schema to be used
        uri - the Akoma Ntoso xml document as a URI (the URL class has a blocking problem)
        Returns:
        AnDocType - this can be OpenStructure, HierarchialStructure etc.This returns the object returned by getAct() , getBill() etc. whichever may be the appropriate doc type. Encapsulated with other information related to the object
        Throws:
        JAXBException
        SAXException

      • parse

        public static AnDocType parse(AnVersion version,
              File fanXml)
                       throws SAXException,
                              JAXBException
        Unmarshalls an Akoma ntoso document - and returns an object of the identified type in the document. If the document type cannot be idenitifed, returns null.
        Parameters:
        version - an AnVersion object identifying the version of the schema to be used
        fanXml - the Akoma Ntoso xml document as a file. Note: no existence checks are done
        Returns:
        AnDocType - this can be OpenStructure, HierarchialStructure etc.This returns the object returned by getAct() , getBill() etc. whichever may be the appropriate doc type. Encapsulated with other information related to the object
        Throws:
        JAXBException
        SAXException
